original_text: When our ancestors were in the wilderness, they carried a special tent with them. It showed that God was there with them and that is where they worshipped him. God showed Moses how he should make that tent. The people made it in the way that God had said.
korean_text: 광야에서 우리 조상들에게 증거의 장막이 있었으니 이것은 모세에게 말씀하신 이가 명하사 그가 본 그 양식대로 만들게 하신 것이라

sentences.original_text: When our ancestors were in the wilderness
they carried a special tent with them
It showed that God was there with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님께서 그들과 함께 계심을 보여주었습니다

sentences.original_text: and that is where they worshipped him
God showed Moses how he should make that tent
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 모세에게 그 장막을 어떻게 만들어야 하는지 보여주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: The people made it in the way that God had said
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들은 하나님이 말씀하신 대로 그것을 만들었습니다
